duplicates.fragment:
"; do
  echo "Attempting to download RNNoise model from: $u" >&2
  tmp=$(mktemp)
  if has_cmd curl; then
    if curl -fsSL "$u" -o "$tmp"; then
      if [[ -s $tmp ]]; then
        mv "$tmp" "$dest"
        echo "Saved RNNoise model to: $dest" >&2
        exit 0
      fi
    fi
  else
    if wget -qO "$tmp" "$u"; then
      if [[ -s $tmp ]]; then
        mv "$tmp" "$dest"
        echo "Saved RNNoise model to: $dest" >&2
        exit 0
      fi
    fi
  fi
  rm -f "$tmp" || true
done
